bio:
A Nord man who has been hired by Ralis Sedarys (a Dark Elf man) to protect the miners working in Kolbjorn Barrow from draugr and potential bandits. He is skilled with melee weapons.
The player is financier of this operation, providing Ralis the gold with which the miners and guards have been hired. Kolbjorn Barrow is an ancient Nord crypt on southwestern corner of Solstheim. The crypt is currently partially buried in ash. The miners' job is to shovel out the ash so that Ralis and the player can explore deeper within the crypt.
name: Kolbjorn Guard
